meanings.definition: In a manner that involves mutual agreement or consent.
meanings.sent1: They decided consensually to share the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent2: The group consensually agreed on the best approach to the project.
meanings.sent3: The cats consensually decided to take over the house and make it their kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The sun and moon consensually shared the sky, taking turns to light up the world.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed consensually, painting the fields with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: In a way that is based on the unanimous approval or agreement of all parties involved.
meanings.sent1: The team consensually celebrated their victory with a pizza party.
meanings.sent2: The board members consensually approved the new company policy.
meanings.sent3: The penguins consensually decided to have a formal dinner party on the iceberg.
meanings.sent4: The stars consensually twinkled in the night sky, creating a mesmerizing display.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed consensually against the shore, creating a soothing rhythm.
